name: Woodcutter
description: Woodcutter is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real carpenter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of window architraves: creating a workpiece blank, choosing the shape of the future architraves, sawing, milling, painting, etc. The player is invited to make a window casing step by step: glue a blank from the boards, choose the shape of the product, cut the blank, mill it, paint it. The owner of the workshop will help you go through all the stages of manufacturing, who throughout the game will tell you what and how to do, as well as some interesting facts about carpentry. To get acquainted with the features of management, a training mode is provided.
